reviews.review: I like the idea of the game quite a bit - player vs player (killer vs survivors) and the execution is very decent. There are  some issues - mainly the balancing but it is 1 v 4 game it is expected and the bugs are being fixed (admittedly not as fast as they should be but some developers don't even bother so yah) I believe it can be a lot of fun with friends though the community can be rather toxic at times.
лучшая хорор игра не смотря на баги
Если вы планируете поиграть за маньяка, то советую вам запускать поиск лоби перед сном, ибо когда вы проснетесь, вам останется ждать часа три, вместо 11-12и
This game is really awesome and makes alot of fun. You also can meet people from all over the world!!
muito bom, recomendo a todos que gostam de um bom susto.

за майника долго ищица игра очень долго

A fun and thrilling game to play, i personally find the game to be a mix of stressful moments to amazing victories to some bad games you have here and there. The game has so much variety and many ways to play the game with different play styles from sneaky clauds to sabo jakes so on and so forth, Killer is super enjoyable just having that idea of strategy you need to get that mindgame or pallet drop etc. Overall I definitely recommend and think you should especially play with friends.

Takes a while to figure out all the little nuances of the game. But once you get the hang of it it's very fun and enjoyable. I would say probably the best and most popular asymmetric multiplayer game out there at the moment.
